CustomField.formula: HYPERLINK("http://www.google.com/maps/search/?api=1&query=" + IF( Location__Latitude__s < 1,"0" + TEXT ( Location__Latitude__s ), TEXT( Location__Latitude__s))+ "," + IF(Location__Longitude__s < 1, "0" + TEXT(Location__Longitude__s), TEXT (Location__Longitude__s)),"Link")
CustomField.label: Map
